channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Man who fired on ICE facility hated US government, sought to kill federal agents, officials say
item.description: The gunman who opened fire on an Immigration and Customs Enforcement facility in Dallas hated the U.S. government and wanted to incite terror by killing federal agents.

item.title: Trump signs executive order supporting proposed deal to put TikTok under US ownership
Arizona jury convicts man in string of shootings that killed 8 in metro Phoenix
